compare.common.faq1.a: Pricing varies by plan and usage. Compare total cost based on seats, channels, and add‑ons.
compare.common.faq2.a: Not always. Many teams start fresh and export key data if needed.
compare.common.faq2.q: Do we need to migrate conversation history?
compare.common.faq3.a: Timing depends on integrations, channels, and training. Plan a phased rollout for larger teams.
compare.common.faq4.a: Helvino supports web chat and APIs; confirm any additional channels you require.
compare.common.faq4.q: Can we keep our current channels?
compare.common.finalSubtitle: Start a trial or talk with us to map your requirements.

compare.common.helvinoFitItems.2: Organizations seeking fast setup and clear admin controls
compare.common.helvinoFitItems.3: Companies that want predictable operations without heavy overhead

home.feature1Desc: Embed a customizable chat widget on any site. Smart routing, real-time messaging, and AI-assisted responses.

pricing.faq1A: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect immediately and billing is prorated.
pricing.faq2A: Every new account starts with a 14-day free trial with full access. No credit card required.
pricing.faq3A: You'll see a notification at 70% and 90% usage. At 100%, new conversations are paused until you upgrade or the next billing cycle.
pricing.faq3Q: What happens when I reach my plan limit?
pricing.faq4A: We use Stripe for secure payment processing. You can pay monthly or yearly (save 20%). Invoices are available in your billing portal.
pricing.faq5A: Absolutely. We use MFA, passkeys, audit logs, encrypted sessions, and strict tenant isolation. See our Security page for details.
pricing.faq6A: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your data remains accessible until the end of your billing period.
pricing.subtitle: Simple, transparent pricing for every stage of your business.
pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.trustBadges: Enterprise-grade security included in every plan
pricing.trustedBy: Trusted by teams who value security
pubCompliance.capabilitiesSubtitle: Policies and controls aligned with privacy needs.
pubCompliance.ctaSubtitle: We can share policy and security documentation.
pubCompliance.encryptionDesc: TLS 1.2+ for all data in transit. Secrets and tokens stored with secure hashing (Argon2). MFA secrets encrypted at rest.
pubCompliance.faq.a1: Yes. We provide a standard DPA upon request.
pubCompliance.faq.a2: Yes. Retention windows are configurable per workspace.
pubCompliance.faq.a3: Yes. Data in transit and at rest is encrypted.
pubCompliance.gdprDesc: Data isolation per organization, configurable retention periods, soft-delete and hard-delete options, and no cross-tenant data sharing.
pubCompliance.how.step1.desc: Set workspace retention windows that match your policy.
pubCompliance.how.step1.title: Define retention
pubCompliance.how.step2.desc: Audit admin access and review security activity.
pubCompliance.how.step2.title: Review access
pubCompliance.how.step3.desc: Use audit logs and exports for internal reviews.
pubCompliance.how.step3.title: Export evidence
pubCompliance.howSubtitle: Controls you can configure and document.
pubCompliance.isolationDesc: Every organization's data is strictly scoped. API middleware enforces org boundaries at every layer. No shared data across tenants.
pubCompliance.recoveryDesc: Structured account recovery with admin approval. Full audit trail for all security and billing actions. Emergency access with mandatory re-verification.
pubCompliance.retentionDesc: Configurable retention periods per organization. Automated cleanup with soft-delete (redact) or hard-delete modes.
pubCompliance.subtitle: Built with privacy and regulatory readiness in mind
pubCompliance.title: Compliance

pubSecurity.abuseDesc: Rate limiting on all authentication endpoints. IP-based throttling. Trusted host enforcement. Security headers including CSP, HSTS, and X-Content-Type-Options.
pubSecurity.auditDesc: Comprehensive audit logs for every security-relevant action. Request-ID correlation for full traceability. Structured logging with zero secret leakage.
pubSecurity.authDesc: Multi-factor authentication (TOTP), passkey support (WebAuthn), step-up verification for sensitive actions, and session management with device tracking.
pubSecurity.ctaSubtitle: Contact us for a walkthrough of controls.
pubSecurity.dataDesc: All data encrypted in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest. Strict org-scoped isolation ensures no cross-tenant data access. Configurable data retention policies.
pubSecurity.faq.a1: Yes. MFA is available for admins and users with policy controls.
pubSecurity.faq.a2: Data is stored in secure infrastructure with tenant isolation.
pubSecurity.faq.a3: Yes. Audit logs are available for security-relevant actions.
pubSecurity.how.step1.desc: Security controls are part of product development and review.
pubSecurity.how.step1.title: Secure by design
pubSecurity.how.step2.desc: We monitor for abuse and unusual activity across services.
pubSecurity.how.step2.title: Continuous monitoring
pubSecurity.how.step3.desc: Admins control access, MFA policy, and data settings.
pubSecurity.how.step3.title: Customer control
pubSecurity.howSubtitle: Policies and controls applied across the platform.
pubSecurity.recoveryDesc: Secure password reset with hashed tokens. Emergency break-glass access for org owners. MFA lockout detection with guided recovery flow.
pubSecurity.subtitle: How we protect your data and your customers
pubSecurity.title: Security
pubSecurity.widgetDesc: Domain allowlist enforcement. Short-lived signed tokens. Site ID rotation. Configurable kill switches for widget, write, and AI capabilities.

recovery.admin.description: Review and manage account recovery requests.
recovery.admin.title: Recovery Requests
recovery.alreadyPending: A recovery request is already pending
recovery.description: If you are locked out of your account, submit a recovery request. An administrator will review it.
recovery.mfaLockoutDesc: Your MFA is enabled but you have no backup codes or trusted devices. You need to request account recovery.
recovery.reasonPlaceholder: Describe why you need account recovery (min. 10 characters)
recovery.title: Account Recovery
recovery.tooMany: Too many recovery requests. Please try again later.
security.activeSessionsDesc: Manage your active portal sessions across devices.
security.allowLocalhostDesc: Enable for local development. Disable in production.
security.allowedDomainsDesc: Only these domains can load the widget. Use *.domain.com for wildcards.
security.changePasswordDesc: Update your portal password. All other sessions will be signed out.
security.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
security.note1: Site ID is public — it identifies your org in the embed snippet.
security.note2: Rotating the Site ID invalidates the old one immediately.
security.note4: Localhost should be disabled in production.
security.note5: Domain changes take effect immediately for new widget loads.
security.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters and include a letter and a number.
security.resetLinkSent: If an account with that email exists, a reset link has been sent.
security.rotateConfirm: Type ROTATE to confirm. This will invalidate the current Site ID immediately.
security.rotateSiteIdDesc: Type ROTATE to confirm. This will invalidate the current Site ID immediately.
security.siteIdDesc: Public identifier used in the embed script
security.title: Security Settings
settings.aiEnabledDesc: Enable or disable AI features (future use)
settings.enforceBillingDesc: When enabled, unpaid or inactive subscriptions block writes after grace period.
settings.grantQuotaDesc: Add bonus quota on top of the plan limits. These persist until changed.
settings.hardDeleteDesc: When enabled: Permanently delete old messages
settings.hardDeleteOnDesc: When enabled: Permanently delete old messages
settings.hardDeleteWarning: Hard delete permanently removes messages. No recovery possible.
settings.lockConfirm: Lock billing for this org? This will block all write operations.
settings.manualLockDesc: Manually lock or unlock writes for this org (overrides automatic billing state).
settings.note1: Kill switches take effect immediately for new requests
settings.note2: Retention policy runs on schedule (manual execution via API)
settings.note3: Hard delete is permanent - consider soft delete for audit trails
settings.note4: Widget settings are cached by clients (may take up to 5 minutes to update)
settings.resetUsageConfirm: Reset all usage counters for this month to zero?
settings.resetUsageDesc: Resets conversation and message counters for this month to zero.
settings.retentionDaysDesc: Messages older than this will be processed by retention policy (1-3650 days)
settings.retentionJobDesc: Retention job processes messages older than retention period
settings.retentionJobHint: Retention job processes messages older than retention period
settings.softDeleteDesc: When disabled: Redact content to "[redacted]" (soft delete)
settings.stripeNotConfigured: Stripe not configured. Checkout/portal sessions will fail until env vars are set.
settings.title: Settings
settings.unlockConfirm: Unlock billing for this org? This will allow write operations again.
settings.widgetEnabledDesc: When disabled, widget will not render on client pages
settings.writeDisabledWarning: Write operations will be blocked (read-only mode).
settings.writeEnabledDesc: When disabled, all POST operations will be blocked
signup.resendHint: Still nothing after a few minutes? We can send a new verification link.
signup.resendLocked: You have used all your resend attempts. For security, please try again later.

signup.successMessage: We sent a verification email to your address. It usually arrives within 1–2 minutes. Check your spam folder too, just in case!

stepUp.description: For your protection, please verify your identity before continuing with this action.
stepUp.retryFailed: Verification succeeded but the action still failed. Please try again.
stepUp.title: Security confirmation required
team.confirmDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this user?

usage.approachingLimit: You are approaching your usage limit.
usage.gracePeriod: Your account is in a grace period. Please update your payment method.
